description:
I've been away working on a new album with The Darkness but I caught up with my favourite band, The Lemon Twigs for a "chatty chat" in Brighton. We talked music, towels and 19th century stained glass. What's not to like? 

Thanks to my friend Gareth Parker for riding with me. 

'Dreams on Toast' - the new Darkness album - comes out in March - when we'll be embarking on a UK tour!
Pre-sale begins on the 25th:  https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/officialstore 
And our new single is here: 
The Longest Kiss: https://thedarkness.lnk.to/tlk 

To go behind the scenes with me or to join a monthly Zoom Call Night, head over to my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

Justin Hawkins Rides Again...The Podcast. You can listen to the archives on Apple Podcast, Spotify etc: https://open.spotify.com/show/0hQYjIww4Rfaka9Fqc11mX?si=ab25d61ba0c74618

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides Again T-Shirt & Hoodie here: https://thejawsofvictory

#react
title: The Lemon Twigs Interview
